data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Breedy, Odalisca (2018): Revision of the genus Adelogorgia Bayer, 1958 (Cnidaria: Anthozoa: Octocorallia) with the description of three new species. Zootaxa 4369 (3): 327-348, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4369.3.2|22 occurrences
